service.title: The 'disclosure' Link Relation Type
service.documentation: This document specifies the 'disclosure' link relation type. It designates a list of IPR disclosures made with respect to the material for which such a relation type is specified.

link-relation.documentation: Whenever the 'disclosure' relation type is used, the resource at the target Internationalized Resource Identifier (IRI) MUST represent a list of patent disclosures made with respect to the material referenced by context IRI.
